messages: edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (19:52): just arrived
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (20:02): thanks
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (20:02): I didn't expect to to be in the middle of nowhere
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (20:03): guess I should have paid more attention
bddfdb28870c5800d938fa0993c46d65 (20:05): I think I can see your building from my window.
bddfdb28870c5800d938fa0993c46d65 (20:05): You're not completely lost :-)
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (20:05): heh
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (20:05): I know where the meetings are
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (20:05): took the bus from the airport and went out at INRIA instead of Les Templiers
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (20:06): so I had to walk back over the moterway...
bddfdb28870c5800d938fa0993c46d65 (20:06): That's not a motorway... And there is a bicycle lane along it on the soutge side.
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (20:06): oh
bddfdb28870c5800d938fa0993c46d65 (20:07): And walking on the motorway is forbidden :-)
bddfdb28870c5800d938fa0993c46d65 (20:07): The "real" motorway, I mean.
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (20:07): oh good
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (20:07): so I haven't quite violated French law yet
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (20:10): bddfdb28870c5800d938fa0993c46d65, any ideas how I can get some food?

bddfdb28870c5800d938fa0993c46d65 (20:10): In typical French fashion, that parallel lane for cycling is interrrupted for a span of 10m or so next to a rundabout, so bicyclists have to use the roundabout, and *in the wrong direction* :-)
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (20:11): you know, the stuff you put in your mouth and makes you go yummy
bddfdb28870c5800d938fa0993c46d65 (20:11): The nearest places are Biot (many restaurants), the Ibis hotel, MacDonalds (near the motorway exit)...
bddfdb28870c5800d938fa0993c46d65 (20:13): None of them really close. 2 - 2.5 km...
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (20:14): yeah, guess I'll have to take a taxi
bddfdb28870c5800d938fa0993c46d65 (20:14): Ideal distance for a bicycle :-)
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (20:15): is that an offer? :)
bddfdb28870c5800d938fa0993c46d65 (20:17): My bicycle is 7 km away, in Antibes :-)
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (20:18): heh
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (20:18): can't seem to reach Molly either
bddfdb28870c5800d938fa0993c46d65 (20:18): Nearest restaurant is probably not the Ibis but the "country club" or what is tis name...
bddfdb28870c5800d938fa0993c46d65 (20:18): That's walking distance.
bddfdb28870c5800d938fa0993c46d65 (20:19): Molly is quite far away, even though she is in Sophia.
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (20:21): Chaals said something about a particular taxi service I ought to use
bddfdb28870c5800d938fa0993c46d65 (20:21): 1.4 km, that should be walking distance with your legs :-)
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (20:21): most certainly :)
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (20:22): what's the address?
bddfdb28870c5800d938fa0993c46d65 (20:24): SOphia Country Club, Rue des Dolines. It's behind (north) of ERCIM.
bddfdb28870c5800d938fa0993c46d65 (20:25): Chaals may have been referring to Monsieur Heduy?
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (20:26): yeah
bddfdb28870c5800d938fa0993c46d65 (20:27): house number 3550 on the route des Dolines, to be precise.
bddfdb28870c5800d938fa0993c46d65 (20:27): Don't know what prices they charge. I've played golf there, but never eaten.
bddfdb28870c5800d938fa0993c46d65 (20:28): Molly's hotel is 4 km away.
bddfdb28870c5800d938fa0993c46d65 (20:29): (But last time I ate there, the food was very good :-) )
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (20:29): cool, I'll walk there and see
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (20:30): thanks
